GClasses::GTwtDoc

GClasses::GTwtDoc Class Reference

Twt is a text-based data format, somewhat like XML. The major differences are: XML is bloated, slow, designed for human readability, feature-rich, and hard to fully implement. Twt is compact, fast, designed for simplicity of machine parsing, simple, and easy to fully implement. (Plus, GTwtNode has methods that will convert to/from XML, so you're never stuck if you use Twt as your file format.). More...

Detailed Description

Twt is a text-based data format, somewhat like XML. The major differences are: XML is bloated, slow, designed for human readability, feature-rich, and hard to fully implement. Twt is compact, fast, designed for simplicity of machine parsing, simple, and easy to fully implement. (Plus, GTwtNode has methods that will convert to/from XML, so you're never stuck if you use Twt as your file format.).
